reasoning: Seminoma is the most common type of testicular germ cell tumor, comprising approximately 40% of all testicular cancers. Global testicular cancer incidence ~7 per 100k (in males), with seminoma at ~2.8 per 100k. Data from GLOBOCAN 2005 cancer registry.
source: GLOBOCAN 2005 (IARC); Parkin DM et al. (2005). Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
